comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: scalarchives.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://scalarchives.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fscalarchives.com) ### Comment > When I try to access scalarchives.com, which is a legit website, I get a AdGuard DNS warning and I can’t access the website. В начале звонка и после него. > com.imo.android.imoim > ``` Username: @vertexx ``` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
@Alex-302 в самом приложении ничего точно не нажимал. Да и вообще реклама появляется только в этих двух случаях. Если нажать на три точки, то там просто написано Hide AD и при нажатии на неё блок с рекламной пропадает. Я добавил вот эти правила и вроде бы реклама ушла:
||up.ousaqb.tech^$app=com.imo.android.imoim
||mmp.shopee.com.my^$app=com.imo.android.imoim
||bstream.channelcom.tech^$app=com.imo.android.imoim
Скорее всего помогло последнее. Пока наблюдаю ещё.

Hide your search queries,

**Browser API**:

Block Location API,
Block Java

**Miscellaneous**:

AdGuard Base Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled Userstyles: | disabled Other extensions used: | `adguard-browser-assistant` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=mac&product_version=2.18.0.2089&system_version=Macos+Sonoma+14.8.3&browser=chrome&filters=2&dns_servers=Cloudflare+DNS&dns.filters_enabled=false&dns.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=true&stealth.location=true&stealth.java=true&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.block_trackers=true)

issue.title: hitomi.la

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Bug

issue.body:
